title: Design-Based Project Learning for Advanced Science Learners in Large-Scale Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and practical experience in scientific fields, with basic proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: Learners access collaborative platforms using their personally owned devices (BYOD) and systematically experience the design thinking process for solving real-world science problems. Continuous feedback is provided through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze and apply a design process for solving scientific problems.
Learners can creatively propose solutions that consider various educational constraints within the context of real-world science projects.
Learners can identify and incorporate contextual variables arising during the design thinking process through collaboration with peers and instructors.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
